trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 中使用 ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs 类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>方法以使用任何数据操作后提供对业务对象实例的访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件和业务对象执行，但业务对象被销毁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用访问业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加一个委托来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件，你可以访问的业务对象执行任何最后的工作或清除任何公开的成员</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method is not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>方法不由调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，如果执行数据操作的方法是`static`方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: No business object instance is created when the method is static.
trans-unit.target: 静态方法时，会创建没有业务对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件可公开可以处理在其生命周期的各个时间用于基础业务对象的多个事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了事件以及关联<xref:System.EventArgs>类和事件处理程序委托。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |EventArgs |EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: 创建业务对象的实例之前立即发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: 创建业务对象的实例后立即发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: 检索的数据之前发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>
trans-unit.target: 执行更新或删除操作在插入、 之前发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: 检索的数据后发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: 晚插入、 更新或删除操作已完成。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: 在业务对象被销毁前发生。 |ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"></xref>类使用指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用该业务对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>进行交互，以执行数据操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，表示与其的业务对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控件将执行数据操作。

trans-unit.source: If the data operation methods (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据操作方法 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) 是实例方法，业务的实例对象之前执行此方法创建。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the ObjectInstance property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 可以防止业务对象的 ObjectInstance 属性中保存对象创建每个调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: In subsequent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events, you can retrieve the business object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在后续<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件，你可以检索中的业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 业务对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>使用数据操作; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>传递给<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>。
